overview: A quiet town that still retains the rural landscape with plenty of greenery, and a forest park that makes use of the vast nature nearby. There is a girl named Ayako, a big, tanned seven-year-old girl who looks somewhat mysterious. She shows up at nurseries and schools and acts strangely, but her children don't even know her name, they just call her "that girl."
title: Asu mo yuyake
